title: Patch 5.2 lag
body: Ever since patch 5.2 my fps seems to drop when buying things and sometimes it happens during team fight and it drops to about 17 fps. I never had this problem before 5.2, before it i always had a stable 60 fps on high settings but now I'm getting random fps drops even when i turn down the settings. Is this happening to anyone else or is it just me?

replies.body: I'm having the same issues.  I've been getting average fps especially in big team fights, then after I die the fps goes instantly back to 60fps.
